input.sentences: the coach is speaking talking about the team morale before the game .
the cheerleaders are gearing up and getting ready for the game as well .
the players are going out to the field to get in formation .
the game is on | may the best team win .
friends and family as well as fans are seated in the bleachers cheering their team on .
output.sentences: The coach was doing his best to hype up the team
The cheerleaders joined in, working hard to build spirits
But it was late, the team were tired as they headed toward the stadium
The whistle blew, the game began, it was clear they weren't going to win
Despite losing the game the fans still cheered, it was a good game after all
